means: （尤指无其他虚荣可供炫耀时）以财富傲人的，散发着铜臭气的

sentence.Network_en: Beaufort was vulgar, he was uneducated, he was purse - proud.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍富特粗俗, 没有教养, 以钱为骄傲.

sentence.Network_en: She has had a fling at that purse - proud grocer's wife.

sentence.Network_en: Derek is now the proud father of a bouncing baby girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 德里克现在为有一个健康活泼的女宝宝而骄傲。
